summary: An ordinance providing for the appropriation of money from the Seattle Sewer Bonds, 1926 Condemnation Fund created by Ordinance No. 51248 as amended by Ordinance No. 55496, into the Block 27, etc., Lake Washington Shore Lands Sewer Right of Way Condemnation Fund under Ordinance No. 60676 as amended by Ordinance No. 62167, to be paid into court for the purpose of satisfying the judgements in said condemnation.
